<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hunter's Bane](/Equipment.aspx?ID=217)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 567 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** An undetected enemy hits you with an attack

**Requirement** You are trained in Survival
</row>

</column>

---

This talisman is a ring of dried, interwoven leaves. When you activate the _hunter’s bane_, you sense the exact location of the attacker, making it hidden from you instead of undetected. If the attacker is behind lead, the _hunter’s bane_ fails and is wasted.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Hunter's Bane
